content:
[Ohio Senate 2024 | Columbus Metro (Franklin County - Upper Arlington/Dublin) | P6: M, 46, Financial advisor, Westerville, Trump 2020, moderate Republican]
Q: Several of you have mentioned the gap between Columbus and the rest of Ohio. How does that affect this race?
"Democrats have written off rural Ohio. Those people know it and resent it."
participant_profile: M, 46, Financial advisor, Westerville, Trump 2020, moderate Republican
preceding_moderator_q: Several of you have mentioned the gap between Columbus and the rest of Ohio. How does that affect this race?
content_original: Democrats have written off rural Ohio. Those people know it and resent it.
